Notes: A purple bug enemy that charges at the player if they see the player. It can be defeated by Ground Pounding on its back. It drops three Star Bits in SMG1 and a single Coin in SMG2 when defeated. It can be frozen using the second player's pointer.

Obj_arg0.Name: Rotation Angle
Obj_arg0.Description: How many degrees it alternates left and right. Default is 180.

Obj_arg1.Name: Movement Distance
Obj_arg1.Description: How far it moves when it charges at the player. Default is 1000.

SW_DEAD.Description: Gets activated when it dies. If used, it won't drop any items.

SW_A.Description: If activated, it will start to fall down which causes it to be respond to gravity.
